meaningMnemonic: When the <kanji>sell</kanji>ing is <kanji>cut</kanji>, that means something is <vocabulary>sold out</vocabulary>. You'll see this word a lot in stores (or, hopefully you won't...) in Japan. Look out for it if you're able!
readingMnemonic: This word uses the kun'yomi readings for both kanji, but you know them both now, so you should be able to read this too!
